price: Basi mwachilie mbali anaye upa kisogo ukumbusho wetu, na wala hataki ila maisha ya dunia.
arabic: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَلَمۡ يُرِدۡ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
footnotes: Basi jitenge nao hao makafiri walio ipuuza Qur'ani na ikawa hamu yao si chochote ila uhai wa duniani tu, wakiyakataa yenye maslaha nao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-aʿriḍ ʿan man tawallā ʿan dhik'rinā walam yurid illā al-ḥayata al-dun'yā
